bike.description: Specialized Jett M4 Aluminum 29" frame, Women's XC 29" Performance geometry and tubesets, fully butted w/ smooth welding, integrated headset, forged post-mount 160mm dropouts w/ replaceable der. hanger, disc only

components.description: RockShox XC28 29", TurnKey hydraulic damping w/ lock out, coil spring w/ custom women's spring weights, 1-1/8" alloy steerer, mag disc only post mount lower, 28mm steel stanchion, preload and rebound adj., 80mm travel, 51mm offset on size 15/SM, 46mm offset on sizes 17/MD and 19/LG
Integrated 1-1/8" threadless, Campy-style, full cartridge bearings
Specialized 3D forged alloy, 4 bolt clamp, 6º rise, 31.8mm

Composite platform, w/ reflectors, 9/16"

Specialized MTB disc hub, alloy, Hi Lo flange, RCC ball bearing system, steel axle, steel cassette body, QR, 32h
